model

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • model.Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Game
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.io.Serializable
    Game model contains the class to create a model for the game. It is bounded with the Game Controller and the Board View.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
